text.text: Ahoy there <@%user-name%> :wave: Good to have you here, make yourself at home :blush:

*Want to be a mentor?*
Checkout <https://github.com/Coding-Coach/find-a-mentor/blob/master/README.md#want-to-be-a-mentor| this>

*Our common channels are:*
 <#CCT9D2TUN> - Please introduce yourself to all :man-raising-hand:
<#CCRBKGZTR> - General questions, notes and highlights
<#CCR78Q1LY> - For technical questions mainly

*Other useful channels:*
<#CJZQ7GDAP>, <#CKB78JH16>, <#CG42660JK>
 :point_right: <#CL5U9SEJC>, <#CCQDTKZC2> and <#CCPS7NR0R> are for the product related discussions. You can reach :male-technologist:<@UCQ9GL8UB> and :male-technologist:<@UFL4N8ETE> for questions about the product :point_left:
